title: Software Engineer
description: Took the lead in front-end development for an E-commerce project, utilizing Next.js for the front end while coordinating with the Laravel backend team. This involved delivering new features, resolving bugs, and ensuring smooth integration between the front-end and back-end systems.
Manage and maintain virtual servers, particularly utilizing Amazon LightSail on AWS, ensuring optimal performance and reliability for the E-commerce project.
Utilize Bitbucket for efficient code sharing and version control, fostering collaboration and ensuring code quality throughout the development process.
Manage other websites, leveraging React.js, Next.js, and Node.js stacks, to address bug fixes and implement enhancements, demonstrating proficiency in front-end and back-end technologies.

Demonstrate expertise in front-end technologies including Next.js, React.js, Tailwind CSS, Material UI, and Bootstrap, ensuring a visually appealing and user-friendly interface for the E-commerce project.
Utilize back-end technologies such as Node.js, Express.js, and Nest.js to develop robust and scalable backend systems, facilitating efficient data handling and API development.

Manage various AWS services including EC2 instances, S3 storage, CloudFront CDN, and LightSail virtual servers, along with experience with DigitalOcean Droplets and Hostinger VPS, optimizing infrastructure for performance and cost-effectiveness.
Implement containerization with Docker, exploring the benefits of a monorepo architecture for managing multiple projects efficiently .

title: Junior Software Engineer
description: Actively participated in Agile ceremonies such as sprint planning, daily stand-ups, sprint reviews, and retrospectives, contributing to the project's alignment with revenue goals and customer needs.
Leveraged Git for seamless code sharing and version control, ensuring smooth collaboration and tracking of changes throughout the development process.
Developed React components using TypeScript, employing modular and reusable design patterns to optimize development speed and revenue generation potential.
Explored and applied TypeScript features to improve code quality and maintainability, enhancing the project's revenue-generating capabilities.
Implemented component-based styling techniques to ensure a consistent and engaging user experience, ultimately driving user engagement and revenue growth.
Adhered to coding standards and best practices to maintain code quality and scalability, supporting the project's long-term revenue goals and sustainability.

Engaged in active collaboration with team members to share insights, brainstorm solutions, and address challenges, fostering a dynamic and productive Agile development environment focused on revenue generation.
